metadata.title: CVE-2022-25942 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in the gif2h5 functionality ofHDF5 Group libhdf5 1.10.4. A specially-crafted GIF file can lead to codeexecution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: hdf5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
